lead_paragraph: The irreverent play is being embraced by artistic directors in American nonprofit professional theaters, American Theatre magazine says.

headline.print_headline: ‘Hand to God’ Is No. 1 for Nonprofit Theaters
headline.main: ‘Hand to God’ to Have 13 Productions This Season

snippet: The irreverent play is being embraced by artistic directors in American nonprofit professional theaters, American Theatre magazine says....
abstract: Robert Askins puppet play Hand to God will be most produced show--excluding holiday-themed works and Shakespeare plays--in nonprofit professional theaters across country for 2016-17 season.
